sourcesContent: import t,{useMemo as r}from"react";import e from"../utils/with-defaults";import{getMargin as i}from"../utils/dimensions";import{StyledDivider as s,StyledDividerText as o}from"./divider.styles";import{jsx as n}from"react/jsx-runtime";const a=({height:t,x:e,y:a,align:l,children:m,textColor:c,css:f,...d})=>{const h=r((()=>{if(l&&"center"!==l)return"left"===l||"start"===l?{transform:"translateY(-50%)",left:"7%"}:{transform:"translateY(-50%)",left:"auto",right:"7%"}}),[l]),u=a?i(a/2):0,x=e?i(e/2):0;return n(s,{css:{margin:`${u} ${x}`,height:`calc(${t} * 1px)`,...f},role:"separator",...d,children:m&&n(o,{className:"nextui-divider-text",color:c,css:{...h},children:m})})};a.toString=()=>".nextui-divider";const l=t.memo(a);export default e(l,{x:0,y:0,height:1,align:"center"});
